title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 371.1 - Definitions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 371.1 - Definitions

State Regulations

Public home care means domiciliary, sheltered or
custodial care in a city or county home for a person 16 years of age or over
for whom care in his own home or some other suitable family home is not
appropriate. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
371.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
